    • Method Detail

      • addFieldByPosition

        IFixedWidthSchemaBuilder addFieldByPosition(java.lang.String name,
                                          int type,
                                          int pos,
                                          int length,
                                          int decimal)
        Add a field to the Record using the Field position and calculating lengths. This is normally the last field defined
        Parameters:
        name - Field name
        type - Field Type
        pos - Fields position in the record
        length - Field length
        decimal - number of decimal places
        Returns:
        This Record.

      • addFieldByLength

        IFixedWidthSchemaBuilder addFieldByLength(java.lang.String name,
                                        int type,
                                        int length,
                                        int decimal)
        Add a field specifying the field length
        Parameters:
        name - field name
        type - Field type. Values include:
        • Type.ftChar - character field
        • Type.ftNumLeftJustified - left justified namber
        • Type.ftNumRightJustified - Right justified number
        length - field Length
        decimal - number of decimal places
        Returns:
        this schema builder (for further updates)

      • skipBytes

        IFixedWidthSchemaBuilder skipBytes(int numberOfBytes)
        Skip a specified number of bytes in the record.
        Parameters:
        numberOfBytes - number of bytes to be skipped
        Returns:
        this schema builder (for further updates)
